snippet.title: Book of Beasts – Teaser Trailer 2020
snippet.description:
playbookofbeasts.com

Become a proud beast summoner and tame beasts in this strategic collectible card game depicting the eponymous beasts. Try to outwit each other with your card deck.

TAME MYTHICAL BEASTS
Collect cards of impressive magical beasts from myths from all over the world

CAST SPELLS
Trade your collected beasts with other players to create your perfect deck

BUILD TACTICAL DECKS FOR BATTLES
Use your cards in battles against other players. Combine the strengths of your beasts and collect coins
